ai-patthana23.41:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles means to the extent of the Dhamma.
ai-patthana23.41:1.1_0: Not seeing the result of past in someone who has no variety of floods, no longer gives rise to results.
ai-patthana23.41:1.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.41:2.1_0: Not in someone who has no longer interpretations of visible objects, no cause or condition.
ai-patthana23.41:2.1_2: There are three more mendicants who have no regrets.
ai-patthana23.41:3.1_0: One who has no longer interpretations of conditions, no longer results in terms of causes and reasons, with no cause or condition.
